actions.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Failed by voice vote.

description: Amendment sought to provide an additional $22 million (by offset) for the purpose of supporting Advanced Submarine Systems Development.
purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 113-170 to reduce the appropriation for Operations and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $22 million and transfer this amount to Research, Development, Technology, and Engineering, Navy for the purpose of supporting development, demonstration, evaluation and fielding of promising undersea technologies in Research, Development, Technology, and Engineering Project Number 2033, for Advanced Submarine Systems Development.
